intro: Pteralyxia macrocarpa, commonly known as the large-fruited pteralyxia, is a species of flowering plant in the family Malvaceae. Its leaves are simple, alternate, and have a rough texture with prominent veins. The fruit is a capsule that splits open to release seeds, contributing to its reproductive strategy in the wild.
